jobDescription: Work with a team of developers to invent, develop, productize and support technology. As Systems Software Engineers you will help build the Next Generation computing platforms at Nvidia. The applications of these platforms are wide-ranging from PC gaming to deep learning on large clusters.  You will need to have a deep understanding of general systems architectures, memory management, CPU, threading, parallel programming, synchronization, Computer networks, RPC and comfortable around hardware specs. As systems engineer, you will develop and program, deploy and productize the SDK on Nvidia Autonomous driving hardware. Required expertise include operating systems principles including areas like memory management and scheduling, strong programming in C/C++/Python, computer networks, data structures, algorithms and problem solving capabilities.
